quotes.quote: We are limited, but we can push back the borders of our limitations. Stephen R. Covey
I will go anywhere as long as it’s forward. David Livingston
A problem is a chance for you to do your best. Duke Ellington
Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine. Anthony J. D’Angelo
Negative results are just what I want. They’re just as valuable to me as positive results. I can never find the thing that does the job best until I find the ones that don’t. Thomas A. Edison
Positive anything is better than negative nothing. Elbert Hubbard
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts. Eleanor Roosevelt
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. Eleanor Roosevelt
Light tomorrow with today. Elizabeth Barrett Browning
First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do. Epictetus
You are joy, looking for a way to express. Esther Hicks
In the end, everything will be okay. If it’s not okay, it’s not yet the end. Fernando Sabino
That which doesn’t kill us makes us stronger. Friedrich Nietzsche
Positivity always wins…Always. Gary Vaynerchuk
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope or confidence. Helen Keller
Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them. Marcus Aurelius
Miracles are born of conviction. Marianne Williamson
Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you. Mary Lou Retton
Positive thinking must be followed by positive doing. John C. Maxwell
Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud. Maya Angelou
If you don’t like something change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude about it. Don’t complain. Maya Angelou
Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation. Michael Jordan
Be the light in the dark, be the calm in the storm and be at peace while at war. Mike Dolan
If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door. Milton Berle
Change your thoughts and you change your world. Norman Vincent Peale
If I persist long enough I will win. Og Mandino
We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars. Oscar Wilde
The less you respond to negative people, the more positive your life will become. Paulo Coelho
A positive mindset brings positive things. Philipp Reiter
Cheerfulness is the very flower of health. Proverb
Conviction is much more powerful than “positive thinking”. The Stoic Emperor
Believe you can and you’re halfway there. Theodore Roosevelt
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time. Thomas Edison
Even though you’re fed up, you gotta keep your head up. Tupac Shakur
Staying positive doesn’t mean you have to be happy all the time. It means that even on the hard days you know better ones are coming. Unknown
Everyday is a second chance. Unknown
Walk slowly but never walk backward. Unknown
On the other side of the clouds is a bright blue sky. Unknown
A little progress each day adds up to big results. Unknown
Keep your face towards the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you. Walt Whitman
Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them. Washington Irving
If you are positive, you’ll see opportunities instead of obstacles. Widad Akrawi
The first step is you have to say that you can. Will Smith
Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact. William James
The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible. Winston Churchill
There is a sense that things, if you keep positive and optimistic about what can be done, do work out. Hillary Clinton
Mix a little foolishness with your serious plans. It is lovely to be silly at the right moment. Horace
Think big thoughts but relish small pleasures. H. Jackson Brown
The dreamers are the saviors of the world. James Allen
I ask not for a lighter burden, but for broader shoulders. Jewish proverb
If you tell yourself you feel fine, you will. Jodi Picoult
Believe deep down in your heart that you’re destined to do great things. Joe Paterno
Keep a smile on your face. Keep a spring in your step. Joel Osteen
Stay positive; stay hopeful. Joel Osteen
We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey. Kenji Miyazawa
One person can make a difference, and everyone should try. John F. Kennedy
Keep calm and keep learning. Lailah Gifty Akita
Life has no limitations, except the ones you make. Les Brown
There are far, far better things ahead than anything we leave behind. C. S. Lewis
The road to success is always under construction. Lily Tomlin
Hope is the companion of power, and mother of success; for who so hopes strongly has within him the gift of miracles. Samuel Smiles
Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future. Robert H. Schuller
Injustice never rules forever. Seneca
Kid, you’ll move mountains! Dr. Seuss
Walk on with hope in your heart, and you’ll never walk alone. Shah Rukh Khan
I inhale hope with every breath I take. Sharon Kay Penman
Find the seed at the bottom of your heart and bring forth a flower. Shigenori Kameoka
A drowning man will clutch at a straw. Sir Thomas More
However bad life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at. Where there’s life, there’s hope. Stephen Hawking
Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart. Steve Jobs
Hope is a passion for the possible. Søren Kierkegaard
When you’re at the end of your rope, tie a knot and hold on. Theodore Roosevelt
Hope is important because it can make the present moment less difficult to bear. If we believe that tomorrow will be better, we can bear a hardship today. Thich Nhat Hanh
A strong mind always hopes, and has always cause to hope. Thomas Carlyle
Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. Thomas Edison
The great majority of men are bundles of beginnings. Ralph Waldo Emerson
Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year. Ralph Waldo Emerson
Turn every life situation into a positive one. Rhonda Byrne
Joy is not in things; it is in us. Richard Wagner
The best is yet to be. Robert Browning
Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines. Robert Schuller
How high you fly is derived from how big you think. Robin Sharma
Create explosive confidence. Robin Sharma
Remember: Every champion was once a contender that refused to give up. Rocky Balboa
Wherever you are, and whatever you do, be in love. Rumi
Clear your mind of “cant”. Samuel Johnson
Why fit in when you were born to stand out? Dr. Seuss
Positive thoughts lead to positive results. Maria V. Snyder
You can, you should, and if you’re brave enough to start, you will. Stephen King
Arise, awake and stop not till the goal is reached. Swami Vivekananda
